name: World of Derby Full
description:
Enjoy the world of chaos and destruction with World of Derby!
Breathtaking battles, unique arenas, lots of modes and different cars won't leave anyone indifferent!

Some of the awesome features of this game:
- Unique battle system
- Easy control
- Realistic, detailed model of damages
- A powerful artificial intelligence of opponents
- Six authentic American cars from the landfill
- 4 game modes
- There is a special hard mode "Against everyone" for experts
- Ability to bet on the game
- Different unique arenas
- Different weather conditions
- Large assortment of car upgrades
- The blasts of destruction cars will blow your mind
- Amazing graphics and effects on a wide range of devices
- Elaborated system optimization

Get ready to get a lot of emotions from destroying enemies and colorful graphics in this exciting game!
Quickly take the car and go to smash!

World of Derby will be updated regularly with your suggestions. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
